Game.Name: Spy Muppets - License to Croak (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl)
Game.plot: Story Kermit the Frog (playing Agent Frog) works for Sam the Eagle (playing Agent Patriot) who gives Agent Frog three different missions. Each mission centers around a certain villian and can be played in any order. Each mission has a series of levels. Missions Dr. Nose briefing screen. Mission 1: Enemy - Dr. Nose ( Gonzo) Back-up - Triple F ( Fozzie Bear)Level 1 - You must fix a snow machine by selecting the correct parts.Level 2 - You and Triple F must chase Dr. Nose's Hench Chickens on the snow machine.Level 3 - You must throw snowballs at the Hench Chickens.Level 4 - You must try and push all the buttons as Dr. Nose pushes them back up. Mission 2: Enemy - King Prawn (Pepe the Prawn) Back-up - Agent Rodent (Rizzo the Rat) King Prawn briefing screen. Level 1 - You must fix a boat by selecting the correct parts.Level 2 - You and Agent Rodent must chase King Prawns Hench Lobsters on the boat.Level 3 - You must swim through an underwater cave and avoid lobster claws that are trying to get you.Level 4 - You must battle King Prawn, to defeat him you must electrocute his giant lobster claws. Mission 3: Enemy - Piggy Galore briefing screen. Piggy Galore ( Miss Piggy) Back-up - Agent Argh ( Animal) Level 1 - You must fix a motorcycle by selecting the correct parts.Level 2 - You and Agent Argh must chase after Piggy Galore's Hench Pigs on the motorcycle.Level 3 - You must throw items at the Hench Pigs in the food factory.Level 4 - You and Piggy Galore must battle each other by throwing items at each other.
